title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Miami Masters Men's Singles Results
text: March 23, 2018 / 1:20 AM / in 22 minutes   Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 2   Results   Men's Singles   1st Round .. Thanasi Kokkinakis (AUS) beat Calvin Hemery (FRA) 6-1 6-2 Guillermo Garcia-Lopez beat Tennys Sandgren (USA) 7-6(3) 7-6(6) (ESP) Steve Johnson (USA) beat Victor Estrella Burgos 6-3 6-3 (DOM) Denis Istomin (UZB) beat Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) 7-5 6-4 Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) beat Alex De Minaur (AUS) 6-2 6-4 Marius Copil (ROU) beat Mikhail Kukushkin (KAZ) 7-6(2) 6-4 Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) beat Thomas Fabbiano (ITA) 1-6 6-2 7-5 Daniil Medvedev (RUS) beat Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) 2-6 6-4 6-2 Evgeny Donskoy (RUS) beat Aljaz Bedene (SLO) 7-5 6-4 Dusan Lajovic (SRB) beat Horacio Zeballos (ARG) 3-6 7-6(2) 6-4 Nicola Kuhn (ESP) beat Darian King (BAR) 7-6(4) 6-4 Radu Albot (MDA) beat Ricardas Berankis (LTU) 6-1 4-6 7-6(4) Denis Shapovalov (CAN) beat Viktor Troicki (SRB) 6-3 6-7(4) 7-6(6) Leonardo Mayer (ARG) beat Donald Young (USA) 3-6 6-4 6-2 Yuki Bhambri (IND) beat Mirza Basic (BIH) 7-5 6-3
